# iru_device_lost_mode (Data Source)

Get Lost Mode details for a specific device. To manage Lost Mode, use `iru_device_action_enable_lost_mode`, `iru_device_action_disable_lost_mode` (standard unlock), or `iru_device_action_cancel_lost_mode` (error recovery).

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_device_lost_mode" "example" {
  device_id = "your-device-uuid"
}

output "lost_mode_status" {
  value = data.iru_device_lost_mode.example.status
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.

### Read-Only

- `footnote` (String)
- `message` (String)
- `phone_number` (String)
- `status` (String)
